about_the_game:
Seven years in the making, "Noel the Mortal Fate" is now complete!

"Noel the Mortal Fate" is an adventure game in which Noel, a girl who has lost her physical freedom, and Caron, a demon, team up to take revenge.
Players control Noel, Caron, and their friends as they explore the map, battle hostile characters, and complete other action-packed missions to advance the story.

The fate of Burrows is finally settled!
In "Season Final Part 2," a scenario branching system will determine the "future" of that character.


Story
The time of the decisive battle finally arrived.

Noel and Caron finally cornered Burrows.
Noel and his men raise their fists in a final counterattack against the onslaught of Burrows, who has transformed into the "Demon of the Beginning.

Fugo, on the other hand, sets fire to the abandoned steelworks of Dressel, his former home, as a diversion.
But standing in their way is their old nemesis, Dratton.
What is Fugo's answer after a battle that puts both men's pride and willpower on the line?!

What will the girl see at the end of this long but short tale of revenge?
What will the girl and the devil meet?
The future of Laplace is now entrusted to a girl.
